basics.name: Chris J Mears
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced senior software engineer with a strong foundation in software development and a passion for data engineering, data analytics, machine learning, and AI. Skilled in TypeScript, Node.js, Python, and SQL. Seeking to leverage technical expertise to contribute to data-driven solutions and drive innovation in a new role.

work.name: Wandering Leaf Studios, LLC
work.position: Owner / Software Engineer / Data Engineer / Data Analyst
work.summary: My consulting business that helps clients navigate their data and technology.
highlights: Advise clients on data collection strategies and build dashboard-driven analytics solutions using Excel, Python, and TypeScript.
Develop custom data pipelines and APIs on AWS and GCP, reducing data processing costs.
Conduct in-depth exploratory data analysis (EDA) and create data visualizations in various domains.
Effectively communicated with clients through multiple support channels and provided debugging support.

work.name: Definitive Healthcare / Carevoyance
work.summary: Early engineer hire for twice acquired healthcare claims analytics startup
highlights: Contributed to UI architecture and data visualization projects as an early hire, utilizing AngularJS and Svelte to enhance user experience and interface functionality.
Developed dynamic and insightful Google Data Studio dashboards, transforming complex data into actionable visualizations for stakeholders.
Leveraged PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch to optimize database indexing and management, improving data retrieval efficiency.
Expanded technical skillset by gaining proficiency in TypeScript and integrating it with JavaScript while working on innovative front-end solutions.
Assisted in the development of a data pipeline, facilitating the seamless extraction and loading of data from BigQuery to PostgreSQL through API integration.

Contributed to the creation of a robust PowerPoint generation system, implementing dynamic variable input and chart generation using Python and JavaScript, and supported the integration of ROI calculation tools to enhance sales insights.
Gained expertise in a graph knowledge database utilized for healthcare procedure referrals, analyzing Medicare and commercial claims data for improved decision-making.
Enhanced understanding of healthcare business metrics by generating comprehensive reports on Total ROI, Case Loss, Procedure Treatment Destinations, and Readmissions Analysis.
Collaborated within an enterprise-level monolithic platform, focusing on data architecture and system design principles.
Developed foundational knowledge in data analysis, data engineering, and API development to support team initiatives.
Managed and optimized Elasticsearch operations while overseeing cloud services on AWS and Google Cloud, enhancing system reliability and performance.

work.name: Amazon / Goodreads
work.summary: Hired pre-Amazon acquisition and contributor to mobile web development team
highlights: Built cross-browser and cross-device compliant mobile web app using Ruby on Rails and JavaScript.
Mentored junior team members on web development conventions and best practices.

work.name: Canned Banners
work.summary: Technical co-founder, Software Engineer, and Data Engineer for a three-person startup; acquired by Adacus in Jan 2018
highlights: Technical co-founder of a small adTech startup, which was acquired in 2018.
Automated the backend for a dynamic ad creation product, which generated revenue for over 5 years with no maintenance.
Architected the PHP backend platform, automated reporting, and configured data pipelines and data storage for our products using AWS cloud services.

Assisted with bigger picture technical decisions and took the initiative to perform the duties of data engineer, lead software developer, systems administrator, database administrator, and cloud systems architect.

work.name: Cisco Systems
work.summary: Hired as contract-to-hire before joining full-time as a FE Engineer
highlights: Optimized front-end code, which significantly reduced download times and improved browser compatibility for an enterprise-level media platform.
Influenced the internationalization (i18n) effort and worked with senior developers to implement custom text replacement in the Cisco Media Solutions Group.

work.name: Foodbuzz, Inc
work.summary: Career pivot to Full-stack Web Development
highlights: Established the front-end web development framework for a small startup and initiated team coding standards.

work.name: Wine Institute
work.summary: The Wine Institute's first IT hire!
highlights: Continuously improved non-profitâ€™s IT infrastructure with a minimal budget.
Migrated the main member database, rebranded and reorganized the website, and managed the network, asset management, security, and documentation.

work.name: Progressive Insurance
work.summary: First full-time job after graduating university.
highlights: Provided Tier 2 network support for all United States remote offices, including daily interaction with phone carriers such as AT&T and MCI Worldcom.

work.name: NCR
highlights: Provided Tier 2 network support for all United States remote offices, including daily interaction with phone carriers such as AT&T and MCI Worldcom.

work.name: BAE Systems
work.summary: First job doing development work before and during university
highlights: Collaborated corporate web team to deliver ColdFusion web applications for the U.S. Navy (AEGIS), Defense Energy Support Center (DESC), and corporate inter/intranet.

courses: Computing for Data Analysis (Python, Pandas, SQL)
Business Fundamentals for Analytics: Accounting, Supply Chain, Financing, Marketing, Strategy
